text: Patrick J. O'Connor (born 1955) is an American politician. He was the alderman in Chicago's City Council representing the 40th Ward on the North Side of the city from 1983 through 2019. O'Connor was an unsuccessful candidate in the Democratic Party primary election for Illinois's 5th congressional district special election, 2009.Spielman, Fran Ald. O'Connor now the favorite to get backing for Emanuel's seat Chicago Sun-Times, January 6, 2009 He lost his re- election bid in the April 2 runoff in 2019 to Andre Vasquez. ==References== ==Other websites== *40th Ward Gazet website of Citizens for Patrick O'Connor political action committee * What's the Deal with All Those Motels on North Lincoln Avenue? * Web page of wife Barbara O'Connor on the Dream Town Realty website Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago City Council members Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Patrick J. O'Connor
